description: Mike's latest new recruit - what a hot find he is.  Dawson is 22 years old, 5'8' and weighs 164 lbs.  This soldier calls Los Angeles California home when he isn't here serving his country.  His innocent smile is a mile wide as Mike leaves him alone for a few minutes to get comfortable.Once Mike is gone, Dawson loses his shirt and turns around to give us a show of those gorgeous back muscles as he starts playing with his cock down in his jeans.  We get to see a glimpse of his pretty ass in those jeans as he pulls them back and forth with each tug.  Finally, the pants come down to reveal some delicious cheeks as Dawson rubs his ass and shows off for the camera.Dawson starts off a bit shy in the beginning, but watch out -- it's those types that will surprise you the most when you least expect it!
title: Dawson, Scene #01
